name: tictactoe
description: The TicTacToe game in a few lines of vanilla ES6

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp public/* build/ && JS_FILENAME=tictactoe.min.$(date +%s).js; browserify src/tictactoe.js -t babelify -t cssify --plugin [minifyify --no-map] --plugin bundle-collapser/plugin -o build/$JS_FILENAME && cat src/index.html | sed -e "s/__JS__/$JS_FILENAME/" > build/index.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && surge build tictactoe.layfla.gs

author: Lay Flags
